content: आभोगः [आ-भुज्-घञ्] {@--1@} Curving, winding. {@--2@} A curve; आभोगकुटिला (गङ्गा) <ls>Mb.</ls>; crumpling. {@--3@} Circuit, circumference, expanse, extension, precincts, environs; अकथितोऽपि ज्ञायत एव यथायमामोगरतपोवनस्येति <ls>Ś. 1</ls>; गगनाभोगः the expanse of heaven, wide firmament of the sky; <ls>Bh. 3. 57</ls>; <ls>Mv. 6. 30</ls>; <ls>Māl. 9. 16.</ls> {@--4@} Magnitude, fulness, extent. expansive form; गंडाभोगात् <ls>Me. 92</ls> from the broad cheek; प्रतिरवाभोग <ls>Māl. 3. 8</ls>, <ls n="Māl.">4. 10</ls>, <ls n="Māl.">5. 11</ls>; प्रतिभयाभोगैः प्लवंगाधिपैः <ls>Mv. 6. 24</ls> bodily form or stature; <ls>U. 2</ls>, <ls n="U.">2. 14</ls>; भवाभोगोद्विग्नाः <ls>Bh. 3. 42</ls>, <ls n="Bh. 3.">86</ls>; <ls>Mv. 2</ls>; <ls>K. 305</ls>, <ls n="K.">333.</ls> {@--5@} Effort. {@--6@} The expanded hood of a cobra (used by Varuṇa as his umbrella). {@--7@} Enjoyment, satiety, completion; विषयाभोगेषु नैवादरः <ls>Śāntilakṣaṇa</ls>. {@--8@} A serpent.
